message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you get 40. What do you say?
Your offer was kind of unfair to me.  I'm proposing a larger split in my favor this time, but remember the money loses value quickly! Let's settle this round.
Okay, I'll compromise.  Let's split it 45 for me and 55 for you.  We need to end this soon or the money will be worth nothing!
